thread.message: Hi, I saw your post about the light fixture. I can fix that tomorrow morning.
Hi Chinedu, thanks for reaching out. What time works for you tomorrow?
Around 10 AM works for me. I’ll bring the necessary tools. My rate is ₦12,000.
That sounds good. Can you confirm if that includes the cost of any replacement parts?
The rate covers labor. If we need a new bulb or wiring, that’s extra—probably ₦2,000-₦3,000.
Got it. Can you check the fixture type before coming? It’s a ceiling mount, about 30cm wide.
Sure, I’ll bring tools for a standard ceiling mount. Can you send a photo to confirm?
Good morning! I’m available tomorrow for the plumbing fix you posted about.
Hi Mary, great to hear. Can you make it by 11 AM tomorrow?
Yes, 11 AM works perfectly! Should I bring any specific parts?
Please check if you have a 1-inch PVC pipe. The leak is in the kitchen sink.
Got it. I have some PVC pipes, but I’ll confirm the size. Is it a single or double sink?
It’s a double sink. Also, the water pressure seems low—can you check that too?
Sure, I’ll bring a pressure gauge to test it. My rate for the job is ₦15,000, okay?
I can do ₦10,000 for labor and parts. Any chance you can match that?
I’ve worked on similar electrical issues before. I can assist you this weekend.
Thanks, Abdul! Can you do Saturday at 9 AM?
Saturday 9 AM is fine. What’s the issue? Is it wiring or a breaker problem?
The lights in the living room keep flickering. Might be the breaker.
Okay, I’ll bring a multimeter to test the breaker. Could also be loose wiring.
Sounds good. How much do you charge for this kind of job?
For diagnostics and repair, it’s ₦18,000. Parts are extra if needed.
Can you share a photo of the issue before I come over?
Sure, I’ll send it shortly. It’s a cracked tile in the bathroom.
Thanks for the photo. Looks like a ceramic tile. Do you want just one replaced or the whole section?
Just the one tile for now. I have a spare that matches.
Perfect. I can do it tomorrow afternoon. My rate is ₦8,000 for the job.
That works. Can you confirm the time? Around 2 PM?
2 PM is good. I’ll text you when I’m on my way.
